abilities.name: For the Khan!
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[ASSAULT]** ability and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[LANCE]** ability.

abilities.name: Trophy Taker
abilities.rule: Each time this model destroys an enemy **CHARACTER** model, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Inspiring Commander
abilities.rule: If you include this model in your army, until the end of the battle, non-**CHARACTER** models in **OUTRIDER SQUAD** units from your army have an Objective Control characteristic of 3 while they are not Battle-shocked.
